body:
$SPY  Check the date on the post below, did you not think Markets had to calm down? Its healthy 
 
I was having a conversation in Jan/Feb w/ some ST Perma-Bulls & I said to look for Wall St to start Selling  in April into May's rate hike, they said the "Sell In May thing was dead statically"  which I respond "Thats why they will sell in April" 
 
The people who are the most angry now are the people who didn't do their homework & didn't prepare for this, even those of use who did are still a little caught off guard that there is this much fear in Markets & so many are scared but it happens so,.. 
 
I will promise you this, if you stopped listening to CNBC or Bloomberg pundits telling you to Buy, Buy, Buy your brain will be much clearer & you'll see whats coming next 
 
$aapl $amzn $nfkx $qqq

$AAPL how can you bet against Apple... just look at the popularity of their products and how innovative they are. It appeals to most population of the world and as premier product it will continue to fill the demand. Stock prices and markets share is pegged to revenue and profit simple as that. As long as products keep selling revenue will pour in and rest of the shit they can fix it with money. This will double in 5 years easy. Buy down dips here folks. You need to brave recession as much as you celebrate bull season to buy when shit is cheap not other way around. I made my wealth in 2000 and 2008 and 2020. I am making down 2022 as another year to buy things cheap.
$AAPL NOT that hard to make profits on the daily... Just pay attn.

$AAPL $GME $AMC How to get paid on a market crash…

$SPY I got my ass kicked hard last week - Blew up my account 💥-  started with 5k in December got up to 40k took out 10k 5 for my Mom - she needs a vacation and 5 to take care of my original investment- was left 30k (2 weeks ago) that turned into 17k on Monday and Thursday I was on a job site all day with absolutely no reception and down goes Frazier to $8k (options) opened at $4K IV CRUSH said fuck it and let it ride Friday hoping for a miracle 🙏🤷‍♂️😂on the way to zero ! 🤦‍♂️ all that hard work building profits since December gone ! $AAPL & SBUX FUCKED ME HARD !

$SPY $MSFT  $AAPL  $BTC.X $DOGE.X 
Sound familiar?

$SPY $AAPL $TSLA  
 
Simple learning lesson: these are the 20+ largest companies in the world right now. 
 
Question: How many of these companies do you expect to STILL be on this list after 20-30 years? 
 
Solution to the Question: 
- You'll need to go back 20-30 years from today and compile what that same list looked like before and compare it to the current list.  
 
Source of Data: Forbes.
